name: Pancake sospetti
desc: A stack of round pancakes. A burnt scent masks what you can only assume should be a sweet taste. The berries are the only thing saving this dish.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.

value.name: Ricetta: pancake
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Tea Break Pancake.

value.name: Bacca
value.desc: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: Una polvere ottenuta macinando il frumento. In qualunque modo venga utilizzata, soddisfa il palato di ogni commensale.

value.name: Uovo d'uccello
value.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

value.name: Pancake deliziosi
value.desc: A stack of round pancakes. Tender and fluffy, the sweet-smelling pancakes taste like clouds. A heavenly delicacy, no doubt.

value.name: Pancake
value.desc: A stack of round pancakes. A staple originating from afternoon tea in manors. Only the best berries should be picked for this dish.
